mangaName: We May Be an Inexperienced Couple but..
alternativeNames: Mijuku na Futari de Gozaimasu ga
Может, мы и неопытная пара, но...
未熟なふたりでございますが
author: Kawahara Ren
description: This is a story of Ikuma and Sumika, two childhood friends who recently got married and started a brand new life together. At first sight, they seem like a happy couple with nothing to worry about, there is one problem
